text: @ImranKhanPTI Covid situation is worse now in Pakistan and now people are not taking it seriously what's the strategies?? Who is answerable? Tiger force not a solution, complete lock down is one of precautionary step which you made lineant 🤦🙄😒 #coronavirus #Covid_19

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
